arts.ttl: Leeds handed huge boost as Bournemouth confirm major injury blows ahead of Saturday
arts.sum: Daniel Farke and Leeds United will have their work cut out for them when they face Bournemouth this weekend. Andoni Iraola’s side will definitely be a different challenge to what the Whites faced last weekend. arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola left shocked by "unusual" Leeds United tactic this season
arts.sum: Leeds United take on Bournemouth this Saturday looking for successive victories, but face one of the most in-form sides in the division. United’s home form is going to be crucial this season if they want to stay in the Premier League, unbeaten at Elland Road in a run that stretches back to Burnley’s 1-0 victory […] The post Andoni Iraola left shocked by “unusual” Leeds United tactic this season appeared first on LeedsAllOver.

arts.ttl: Leeds vs Bournemouth predictions: Cherries can prosper on the road
arts.sum: Bournemouth have only lost once so far in the Premier League and Tom Hill expects them to pick up another win when they take on Leeds at Elland Road.

Leeds are already beginning to show why they belong in the Premier League after the impressive comeback victory at Wolves made it seven points from a possible 15. You have to go back to November 2022...

arts.ttl: ”They’ll pick them off for fun” – Paul Merson issues blunt Leeds verdict ahead of Bournemouth game
arts.sum: Leeds United will be hoping to continue their form after a big win over Wolverhampton Wanderers last week. The Whites will now be up against a difficult Bournemouth side on Saturday. Daniel Farke’s men will be facing a Cherries side who have not lost a game since the opening game of the season. arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend games predictions - Week 6
arts.sum: The Premier League is back on Saturday and Sunday after the excitement of the midweek Carabao Cup action and Ross Kilvington provides a score prediction for all 10 top-flight matches in England.
